title.value: Te Whatu Ora, Central Region Integration Hub

publisher.value: Te Whatu Ora, Te Pae Hauora o Ruahine o Tararua MidCentral

name.value: Te Whatu Ora, Te Pae Hauora o Ruahine o Tararua MidCentral

description.value: Implementation Guide for Central Region's FHIR based Integration Hub
AllergyIntolerance resource for Te Whatu Ora, Central Region
ClinicalImpression resource for Te Whatu Ora, Central Region - holds mental health legal statuses
Flag resource for Te Whatu Ora, Central Region
Patient resource for Te Whatu Ora, Central Region
Practitioner resource for Te Whatu Ora, Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region Alert

description.value: Complex extension recording meta data about all alerts, on who recorded the [Flag](./StructureDefinition-NZCentralRegionFlag.html) and [AllergyIntolerance](./StructureDefinition-NZCentralRegionAllergyIntolerance.html) flavours of Alert and when.

name.value: HL7 v2 Message

description.value: Base64 encoded string containing the original HL7 v2 message that was used to create / update the FHIR resource

name.value: NZ Central Region Mental Health

description.value: Complex extension recording meta data about patient's mental health, particularly legal status

name.value: NZ Residency

description.value: NZ Residency status

name.value: NZ Central Region - Allergy Alert Category Value Set

description.value: Alert Category codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region that denote an AllergyIntolerance

name.value: NZ Central Region - Allergy Alert Code Value Set

description.value: Allergy alert codes (H1, H3, A3 & A4) ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.

name.value: NZ Central Region - Allergy Reaction Value Set

description.value: Allergy Reaction codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ ContactRelationship Value Set

description.value:
NZ ContactRelationship Codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region
This codeset is to be used alongside the HL7 defined general relationship codeset http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0131

name.value: NZ Central Region - Ethnicity Level 2 Value Set

description.value: Ethnicity Level 2 codes from [Ministry of Health](https://www.health.govt.nz/nz-health-statistics/data-references/code-tables/common-code-tables/ethnicity-code-tables)

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Category Value Set

description.value: Alert Category codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region that denote a Flag

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Code Value Set

description.value: Alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Hospital Value Set

description.value: Hospital identification codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - Language Value Set

description.value: IETF equivalent Language codes, matching the raw codes used by WebPAS in NZ Central Region.

name.value: NZ Central Region - Marital Status Value Set

description.value: Combined Marital Status value set with values that are in use in Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - Mental Health Court Type Value Set

description.value: Mental Health Court Type identification codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - MentalHealthLegalStatus Value Set

description.value: MentalHealthLegalStatus codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.

name.value: NZ Central Region - Mental Health Review Location Value Set

description.value: Mental Health Review Location identification codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - MentalHealthReviewStatus Value Set

description.value: MentalHealthReviewStatus codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region. - denoting if the patient's mental health status review has been completed, if not the reason why.

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ Religion Value Set

description.value: NZ Religion Codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ Residency Value Set

description.value: NZ Residency Codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Residency status

description.value: Is the person a NZ resident

name.value: NZ Central Region - Alert Category Code System

description.value: Alert Category codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - Allergy Alert Codes (H1)

description.value: H1 Allergy alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.

name.value: NZ Central Region - Allergy Alert Codes (H3)

description.value: H3 Allergy alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.

name.value: NZ Central Region - Allergy Reaction (A3, A4) Code System

description.value: Allergy Reaction codes for categories A3 & A4; ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.

name.value: NZ Central Region - Allergy Reaction (H1, H3) Code System

description.value: Allergy Reaction codes for categories H1 & H3; ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ ContactRelationship Code System

description.value:
More granular ContactRelationship codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.
This codeset is to be used alongside the HL7 defined general relationship codeset in http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/valueset-patient-contactrelationship.html

name.value: NZ Central Region - Ethnicity Level 2 Code System

description.value: Ethnicity Level 2 codes from [Ministry of Health](https://www.health.govt.nz/nz-health-statistics/data-references/code-tables/common-code-tables/ethnicity-code-tables)

name.value: NZ Central Region - Marital Status Code System

description.value: A few extra Marital Status codes that are in use in Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Codes (H2)

description.value: H2 (medical condition) alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Codes (H4)

description.value: H4 (infection prevention) alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Codes (H5)

description.value: H5 (situational) alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Codes (H6)

description.value: H6 (transfusion) alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Codes (H7)

description.value: H7 (disability) alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Codes (H8)

description.value: H8 (care plan) alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Codes (LS)

description.value: LS (medical condition) alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Codes (MA)

description.value: MA (medical condition) alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Codes (MC)

description.value: MC (medical condition) alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Flag Alert Codes (NHIMWS)

description.value: H2 (medical condition) alert codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region, that appear in Flag resource

name.value: NZ Central Region - Hospital Code System

description.value: Hospital identification codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - Mental Health Court Type Code System

description.value: Mental Health Court Type identification codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - MentalHealthLegalStatus Code System

description.value: MentalHealthLegalStatus codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.

name.value: NZ Central Region - Mental Health Review Location Code System

description.value: Mental Health Review Location identification codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - MentalHealthReviewStatus Code System

description.value: MentalHealthReviewStatus codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region - denoting if the patient's mental health status review has been completed, if not the reason why.

name.value: NZ Central Region - Proposed Language Code System

description.value: 3 character codes denoting Language ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region; Codes are **PROPOSED** for ietf:bcp:47

name.value: NZ Central Region - Raw Language Code System

description.value: 3 and 4 character codes denoting Language ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region; Codes are **NOT** from ietf:bcp:47

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ Religion Code System

description.value: Religion codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ Residency Code System

description.value: Residency codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Residency status

description.value: NZ Residency status
